Name: C&WS & EMS CHECKS
checklistText:
<size=21>4.1.1 C&WS STATUS CHECK</size>
Panel 2		C/W NORM 						- NORM
			C/W CSM 						- CSM
			C/W PWR 						- 2 (down)
				MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) 	- on, push
			C/W PWR 						- 1 (up)
				MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) 	- on, push
			C/W LAMP TEST 					- 1 (hold)
				MASTER ALARM pb/lt 		- on
				lh C/W lt (14) 				- on
			C/W NORM 						- BOOST
				MASTER ALARM pb/lt 		- out
			C/W NORM 						- NORM
				MASTER ALARM pb/lt 		- on
			C/W LAMP TEST 					- 2 (hold)
				MASTER ALARM pb/lt 		- out
			lh C/W lt (14) 					- out
				MASTER ALARM pb/lt 		- on
				rh C/W lt (20) 				- on
			C/W LAMP TEST 					- rel
				MASTER ALARM pb/lt 		- out
				rh C/W lt (20) 				- out
			C/W NORM 						- ACK

<size=21>4.1.2 EMS PRELAUNCH TESTS</size>
	1 - Initial EMS Prep
Panel 1		EMS FUNC 						– OFF

			CAUTION
	If SPS THRUST lt on, a grd exists on one or both ΔV THRUST sws.

Panel 8		cb EMS MNA/B (2)				– close
Panel 1		Open EMS GTA cover
			GTA sw 							– on (up)
			EMS MODE 						– STBY

	2 - EMS ΔV Test
			EMS FUNC 						– ΔV
			Adj alphanumeric brightness (option)
			Wait 5 sec
	
	3 - GTA Null Adj
			EMS MODE 						– NORM
			Adj GTA null adj until ΔV/RNG least
				significant digit changes <0.1 per 10 sec
	
	4 - EMS FUNC 							– ΔV SET
  			Slew ΔV ind to +1586.8
	
	5 - EMS FUNC 							– ΔV TEST
 			SPS THRUST lt 					– on
 			ΔV ind 							– decr (10 sec)
 			SPS THRUST lt 					– out (at ΔV – 0.1 fps)
 			ΔV ind 							– stops at -20.8±20.7 fps
 			EMS MODE 						– STBY

	6 - EMS FUNC 							– EMS TEST 1 (CCW) (wait 5 sec)
			EMS MODE 						– NORM (wait 10 sec)
				.05 G lt 					– out
				SPS THRUST lt 				– out
				Lift vctr dn lt 			– out
				Lift vctr up lt 			– out
				RNG ind 					– 0.0 NM
		Slew scroll until disp index superimposed upon notch at start 	
		of next self-test pattern
	
	7 - EMS FUNC 							– EMS TEST 2
			Wait 10 sec
			.05 G lt 						– on (all others out)
	
	8 - 	EMS FUNC 							– EMS TEST 3
			.05 G lt 						– on
			Lift vctr dn lt 				– on (10 sec after .05 G lt)
			Set RNG ind to 58.0±0.0 NM

	9 - EMS FUNC 							– EMS TEST 4
			.05 G lt 						– on (all others out)
			G-V trace (during 10-sec period) within test pattern
			After 10 sec, G-V trace stops at lower right corner of test 
			pattern
			RNG ind (during 10-sec period) counts toward zero
			After 10 sec, stops at 0.0±0.2

	10 - EMS FUNC 							– EMS TEST 5
			.05 G lt 						– on
			Lift vctr up lt 				– on (10 sec after .05 G lt)
			RNG ind 						– resets tp 0.0 NM
			Scribe traces vert line = 9 G to 0.28 G & stops (trace within 
			test pattern
	
	11 - Slew scroll until stylus is at 0.28 g tol step of grd test 
		pattern 1 & verify ΔV instructions are visible
	
	12 - EMS FUNC 							– RNG SET
			EMS MODE 						– STBY
				Scribe traces vert line from 0.28 G to 0.0±0.1 G & stops
				All lt 						– out

	13 	EMS FUNC 							– OFF
		
				WARNING
	GTA sw is for grd tests only & must be set off (down) & door
	closed for proper flt oper of EMS.
	
			GTA sw 							– off (down)
			Close GTA cover

Steps.Text: Is MASTER ALARM on, push pb/lt
Is MASTER ALARM on, push pb/lt
Verify left C/W Warning lights and MASTER ALARM - illuminated
Verify P1 MASTAR ALARM pb/lt - out
Verify P1 MASTAR ALARM pb/lt - on
Slew scroll to next test pattern.
